snippet.title: Breakout: Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam in the channel links!

Experience fast-paced shotgun carnage in this mini-roguelite boomer shooter like no other! Fight through over 70 procedurally linked combat arenas, upgrade your fighting abilities and destroy an ever increasing amount of enemy types! A metal army hellbent on destruction stand between you and freedom. Are you ready to take them on?
